column4: how come i can't you this in my command  ./autogen.sh && make && make install?
search on google they ahve instructions
I  installed beryl manager what else i need i need to install?
if you are using regular gnome,  gdesklets in the repos,  ifyou have compiz enable  screenlets google for it
is there an way i can get vm on ubuntu and run it?
menu > applications > add/remove , search for vmware
There is no matching application avaiable.  For vmware

goto menu > system > admin > software sources  check all the boxes on the first tab and backport on the third one , reload,  close and try again in add/remove   and make sure you selected "all available packages" in the drop down list on the right of the search feild
